name: Slay The Slimes
description:
You wake up from napping on the cold dungeon floor to find slimes raining in from the ceiling. Quick, grab your dagger and slay them! You will need to kill them quickly before they release their toxins.

--Controls--

 [A] and [D] or ARROW KEYS to move

[W] or [UP] to jump

[SPACE] or [LEFT CLICK] to attack.

--Joypad Controls--

[LEFT STICK] or [D-PAD] to move

[A] to jump

[RT] or [X] to attack

Check out the POST-JAM version here for all the tweaks and features I didn't have time to implement during the jam. I promise you it's a far better experience or your money back: Slay The Slimes: Post-Jam

This is my first time completing a game. It feels good to finally finish something and get it out there. Thanks for playing, I hope you enjoy it!

In case you're curious, because at this point it's a little subtle. The "Running out of space" theme is the slimes taking up a lot of space, especially as the game progresses.

I will be continuing development on this, but not as it is. I think I'm going to use the code that's there and maybe turn it into a Rogue-like platformer.
